author: ehillenius
msg: absolute positioning messes up layout when you use a default positioning of tags. So I moved that out of getIconStyle as not only did it mess up my project, but I believe it is a better default not to have that. That ok, Johan?

author: awhite
msg: Fix a couple of errors in the code to default to the non-finalizing broker
1) Don't add to the given Map, because it might be read-only.
2) Prefix the BrokerImpl property correctly when adding it.
